body:
Hello! 

I have recently hopped on here again and I've decided to give this server a go, as you guys seem like a very friendly and welcoming community, so why not.

First off, big shoutout to Pelpelajax for bringing me here again. If you don't know this guy yet, I can say he is one of my best friends on the internet nowadays. Thanks for everything you've done for me :)

Who am I?


I'm a 14 year old spanish guy that likes making friends and new experiences. I will hope on the ts pretty frequently, so if you want to know me a little bit more, you could maybe find me there. I'm also a pretty decent coder (java, html, xml, ruby). If you wish to contact me you can:
  • Go on my twitter (link on profile): follow me and ask for a follow back to DM:
  • Shoot me on skype (link on profile) for any other private concern.
  • If you want my email for any official proposes, ask me when I pop on your screen.

I've heard your name somewhere, but where?


You probably know me from the Overcast Network, where I'm a really active player, and recently became part of the tournament staff as a permanent referee. I'm also pretty active on their mumble server and on their web forums, so that's another place to find me if you wish.

AMA


This thread can be also considered as one of those Ask Me Anything thread, so if you wish to, go ahead.

Thanks for reading up this far, and hope to see you rolling on here!

Regards,

javipepe

title: Hello there!

replies.body:
Glad to have you back Javi :) I can say the same about you buddy.
So, can you make me a HTML as fancy as yours? And, when can we have our next karaoke battle?

replies.body: Your format is perfect ;) Welcome   back to Avicus! If you have any questions feel free to ask me, or any staff member. We'd be happy to help :D Also, if you need someone to talk to, I'll try my best to help! ^-^ See you around!
